title: I have questions about recording.
body:
When i record in the game . Where can i find that video record?

If someone knows ? , Please tell me .{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body: Replays are saved server side, which can be pulled up through your match history.  Per the [replay guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/234965248-Replays-FAQ-Pro-Tips), you can then create a highlight of it, which will locally store it in your Documents folder.  I hope that helps!
